summary: AS19 MultiDrive project with Master Admin Dashboard for monitoring user analytics, storage insights, and canister health while maintaining zero-knowledge privacy
architectural_notes: AS19 MultiDrive architecture with cross-lock logic for virtual canisters
Separate protected canister for admin dashboard isolated from user data
Zero-knowledge privacy model - admin can only access metadata, not content
Internet Identity authentication with Principal ID-based access control
Metadata tracking includes size, timestamp, and token ID only
known_issues: Internet Identity authentication has browser compatibility issues and can get stuck during login
Draft version 52 deployment failed - needs investigation
PIN reset lacking verification/security - resets without authentication
PIN information page not auto-hiding after setup

existing_features.title: Create an Admin Dashboard page component accessible only to authenticated users with the Master Principal ID, displaying user count, canister inventory, storage insights, and cycle balance

Design the Admin Dashboard with a dark-themed Command Center interface featuring visual counters for user count and canister inventory, progress bars showing storage distribution across categories, and cycle balance indicators
Create React Query hooks to fetch admin analytics data including user count, canister count, storage insights, and cycle balance from the backend

Display individual storage usage per user token in a table or list view on the Admin Dashboard, showing token ID, total storage used, and breakdown by category (photos, videos, documents, memories) in GB/TB format
Add navigation to the Admin Dashboard from the main application navigation bar, visible only to users with the Master Principal ID

new_feature_requests.summary: Master Admin Dashboard with analytics and metadata tracking
User counter for tracking unique User Tokens/Principals
Canister inventory tracking for virtual canisters
Storage insights showing per-token usage and total aggregated data
Network health monitoring with cycle balance tracking
Privacy guardrail - metadata only access without content visibility
Founder access control restricted to Master Principal ID
Dark-themed Command Center UI with visual counters and progress bars
Create a backend method to track and return the total number of unique user principals (User Tokens) who have created profiles in the system
Create a backend method to track and return the total number of virtual canisters generated by the system
Create backend methods to return storage metadata per user token including total bytes used for photos, videos, documents, and memories, without exposing actual file content
Create a backend method to monitor and return the cycle balance of the main canister
Implement principal-based access control in the backend to restrict all admin analytics methods to only the founder's Master Principal ID
